about_the_game: This demo includes the entire first area of the game, out of a total of 5 areas that will be present within the final game. You will have half of all items that will be in the final game available to play around with. The demo has an infinite mode, once you beat the first area, it will repeat getting increasingly difficult. It is still an unfinished product, so please keep that in mind when playing!

content_descriptors.notes:
Violence, blood and gore.
Drug abuse.
Storyline elements involving depression, suicide, addiction, anxiety, and religion.
